text:
Pehli baar achese 4th sem me ke canteen me baat hui thi apni. Bahot kam time me bahot acchi dosti hogyi...Tum aadmi hi bindaas ho! Thanks for introducing me to bumble...bhai, thoda dhairya rakho bhai accha match aayega. Last time me kaafi bulla kie, will always remember last day storytelling session..aur haan, LNMIT Jaipur ‘संस्थान’ wale hote hi chutiye h!

Shashank hmesa tmhare ghissai aur randi-rona ke baare me batata tha...got to witness some...u r really good at both of them :P Was literally very happy that you got such an amazing job offer (coz a hardworking guy like you deserve all the success in the world!), bs US jaake bhai ko yaad rakhna...aur ek aad iphone lete aana..sune h wahan sasta milta h :D
All the best Khandu bhai! Keep rocking!
author: Piyush

text:
Ye Teri yearbook ki profile pic wali story yaad h?...Everone left us peeing xD Uttrakhand trip was so much fun. Thank god Mukesh didn’t drown us along with him during rafting. Zip-lining was equally adventurous (feeling sad for those who went to Neel Kanth ;) You seem covid +ve even when you r -ve, I couldn’t sleep properly that whole night xD. Trespassing u into H12 during curfew was no less than a covert mission :p Paisa bachane ke chakkar me kya ‘jhaantu’ pizza khila die the bhai tum zomato se..ugh! 

You are chota packet bada dhamaka! Always impressed by your sporting skills, love for adventures (really cool that you trained to paraglide B) and your aaram aaram se chaapne wali ability. All the best, stay in touch and Happy adventuring:) Take care.
author: Piyush

text: If "shakal pe mat jaao" had a face, it would look exactly like yours xD. bhai aap BBQ me kya gajab paise wasool krte ho :p You have my sympathy for that train-romance episode but kahani badi jabardast thi (speical thanks to Pandey Ji)  All the best :) Stay connected aur jahan v rahiye aise hi chaapte rahiye.
author: Piyush

text:
‘Bakait’ - no nickname can suit you more! Be it muggai, research, placements and RR ofc - you nailed it all! The word ‘bakait’ would always remind me of your face when you used to overtake us on mountain scooty rides and give that badass smile!  xD.

I have a very fond memory of internship interview days, we weren’t that close friends back then, but you and Shubham (The batti lords duo) readily agreed to accompany me to TI’s interview and stayed there till 3 am. It really meant a lot to me. Thank you both for that. Your ‘Sangati’ really helped me a lot in academics.

You were my go-to guys for running, gymming and bulla discussions about life in general. We resonate a lot on these fronts - we even made bumble together and there too, you totally stalked the girl I was talking to (Can you believe that!). I am a big fan of your ‘heads down and getting things done’ attitude. I have one complaint though, sometimes you do forget to check back on others but at the end of the day, you are a good guy at heart.

Looking back, I can proudly say that you are a good friend of mine - I am damn sure you would give many more reasons to be proud of in future. Whether it be - IAS or Corporate, you are gonna kill it! All the best!
author: Piyush

text: Eid Mubarak bhai :) You are a very spiritual, generous and hardworking guy with an infectious smile. Always ready to help others. Keep it up :) Thanks for your occasional pep talks and sorry if i hurt you anytime. Take care and all the best!
author: Piyush

text: It’s like have known you since Orientation days (thanks to adjacent wings, same hall and dept) and still didn’t have much interaction wid u till internship days. All that I know is Sharma Ji ki smile mast hai aur Sharma Ji bahot mehnati hai :p Let's vibe together more in Bangalore :) Office me milte hai jald hi (hopefully) till then take care.
author: Piyush

text: Are Arpit, ghar kab nikal rhe? So glad that we met at Kanpur junction while looking for a cab to IITK. Travelling to college and back home became 10x better wid you. Wanna confess something :p, asking you to split petrol price was just me assessing you and I must say you passed with flying colours. Invested those in crypto xD (Thanks to you for the investment and introducing me to crypto) was riding the wave until a week ago, blew them up in Shiba Inu (thanks to the huge dump and wazirX ) Sadly,We didn’t get to hang out much in college, let's explore some of Bettiah asap :) All the best!
author: Piyush

text:
“Arrey!!!” Goel Bhaiya, kidhar gayab ho aajkal? The best part about fresher’s summer was getting to know you - mast aur bindaas goel. Gradually we became friends and then neighbours. Kudos to your efforts in SOC, you single-handedly pulled off the whole back-end thing. 

Uttarakhand-Delhi trip was so perfect - from Shastra Dhara and robbers cave to crazy bike rides, rafting and zip-lining! You were really a great help during intern prep and subsequent late-night exams. You were always fun to be around, whether it be playing mini-militia or badminton/volleyball, prep for exams or pulling pranks and muchmore!

Chahe 50 rupaye me screenguard lagwana ho ya cheap branded clothes, you had jugaad for everything! A very hardworking and helpful friend with some real leadership skills. Banglaore me milte hai ;) All the best!

P.S - You were majorly missed in the last time bro :(
author: Piyush

text: Vipin se kaafi suna tha apke bare me thankfully last mahine me thoda janane ka mauka v mila. Zyada baat to nahi hui apni but jitti v hui I can surely say you are a nice person - humble, soft-spoken, helping and hardworking to name a few and uou have such a mesmerizing aura around you. Bhai tum akele IME634 sambhal lie apan log ka. Thanks:) Small world, hopefully our paths cross again. Next time would definitely love to know you better till then all the best, take care and be yourself :)
author: Piyush

text: Aur Shrotriya, Macro-eco padh lie? ...that’s how we met. Thanks to your namesake goel to introducing us formally, baki tmhari shakal to orientation se hi dekh rhe the. TA202 presentation me kya gajab ML laga die the bhai tum ..utta to MLSP me v nahi lagae kabhi. xDA Simple, intelligent and hardworking guy, jo mobile me hi lectures padh ke chaap deta :p. All the best , stay connected aur aise hi phodte raho :)
author: Piyush

text:
Bhai apna extremes pe khelta h - ya to full on backchodi ya to ekdm khoya khoya (though rarely :p), ya to super confident (‘maa chudaye’) ya poori fati hui (‘gande l***e lag gye yaar!’)... Bhai, intelligent to tum vibrant se hi ho but Vanamala ke bluff ke sikaar kaise hogye iti aasani se (hmlog ka v katwa die saath me xD) Will always remember musoorie trip - trip kam, khatron ke khildai zyada hogya tha! (bc kahin v scooty chada dete the hmlog) Kya lade the bhai tum aur mukesh...rokne me gaand lag gyi thi meri aur meena ki aur rap-wap likhna shuru kro firse!

Missed you during our wing photoshoot sessions...bata ke jaana hota bhai:( Thanks to covid, tmko v positive kr gya :p... we got really worried when you weren’t picking our calls! B-top ka tempo high hai! See ya in Bangalore. All the best and take care!
author: Piyush

text: From the little conversations we had, you seem like a fun and chill dude. College me to utti jaan pehchaan nahi ho paayi, Bangalore me pakke se krte hai :) HR ko hmaare exsistence ki yaad dilane ke lie shukriya xD Lets hope ki ab offer letter v jaldi aajae.
author: Piyush

text:
First year ka bas itna yaad ki pandey bahot magg rha branch change maanra usko. Josh me volley me jeetna sapna reh gya :| Yaad h, one day - I asked any actress or you know who - who’s more beautiful and you chose the later...tabhi samajh gye the mamla gambhir ho chuka h :):

Bhai, you were a great comfort during Cisco interviews...If it weren’t for you, I surely would have panicked in those 6 hours...and  ‘ghadi kholna’ was a good idea indeed! ’Bhai tmko waitlist me daal dia h’ prank literally scared the shit out of me :’) and ‘2 mahina ghees ke PPO lagwa lena h kaise v’ definitely helped while securing one! Thanks a lot!
 
Bahot 'Khusi' mili thi when you got PPO (Tumko Khusi mili?..ab mil jaayegi!..eligible bachelor h bhai apna!) as you always explained how 18+ LPA me zidagi set h! Thank god you got convinced to be OPC (mehnat safal hui meri aur mukesh ki)...kudos to your efforts...baaki late replies wala gila sikwa to h hi ...iska aur internship ke due masti ka bharpai bangalore me krna padega (bach ke kahan jaoge, apna to office v bagal me h) :) aur Jaldi offer letter bhejwao yaar, Kis din ke lie OPC the ;) 

You are very hardworking, dedicated and helpful (a little more for a few special). Keep shining and smiling (you have a pretty one!). All the best Pandey Ji!  Looking forward to good times ahead 0:)
B top ka tempo high hai!

PS - Do remember our magic formula for ***** calculation :D
author: Piyush

text: Thanks to dept courses 2nd year me acchi interaction hogyi hmaari. Tum to bc bahot chaapu nikle :).Sports (wo v multiple) + dance + maggai + bandi..sab ek saath handle kr lete ‘Badminton ka juggad kr de yaar’! aur ‘Chal fir volley hi chal lete’ me hi last month nikal gaya xD. Just go with my last day advice ;) Fodte raho aur dhyaan rakho :) Bangalore me milte hai bro!
author: Piyush

text: Kota me pata chala ki Bansals chaapu hote h, itte zyada hote h ye tmse milke pata chala bhai! still so humble and down-to-earth :) Didn’t have much interaction wid u but have always admired the person you are...so much good qualities, all packed in one. Sona ho bhai tum, aise hi jahan v jaao chamak bikherte raho! All the best and take care!
author: Piyush

text:
Kar-tik to suna tha pehle but you were the first Kra-tik I met - you definitely raised the bar for all ur namesakes! Banda smart h, chaapu h, backchod football khelta h upar se dance v krta h - It’s really hard to believe that u r single (Thanks to all boys school, Kota and iitk ..just like me!) but surely won’t be for too long in Amex (ab to hairstyle v sexy kr lie ho B) 

Uttrakhand trip was lit. kya maze kie yaar hmlog ne. Thanks for making us roll (EDMs won’t be the same without you!) and keep radiating good vibes :) See ya good Hooman - always calm and nice, till then stay connected! All the best and Take care!
author: Piyush

text: Leelayein aur gopiya to aapki v kam nahi Krishan ji :) Chaapu-ness to tmhare khoon me h literally, bs jarurat h UPSC exam me use dikhane ki! (Panasonic to first year me hi pehchaan gya tha) Thoda randi-rona kr dena (as usual) kya pata sahi cadre mil jaae. Gujrat milega to deal hai hi apan dono ka :P Hopefully we will cross paths again (may be in north/south block)...let’s hope for the best! Aise hi jhande gaarte raho aur backchodi krte raho. All the best and stay in touch!
author: Piyush

text:
You have been a constant support and pain in the ass for the past 4 years. IITK had pre-destined that these two guys would end up being close friends - we shared - wing, ‘baap’ ( should we call him that ?!), department, coursework home-city, the same crush...and many more.
 
You are really an inspiration man.. have beaten a lot of odds and I sincerely wish you keep on doing so. Labs, classes, bullas, trips in short these 4 years would not be the same without you. It was a hell lot of fun cheating with you (Mr. fattu) in exams - Really OMG!. But I knew for a fact if Mukesh has solved it on his own - it has to be correct. 

Apart from all the nicknames, I have called you, the occasional gyaan session and the frequent gang bangs…I truly admire your helpfulness, hard work and ‘coolness’ (You finally made it ) to name a few. The best thing about you is - you help others profoundly and you never ever make them feel so.

Just be punctual (You better know why!) and take the leap (wrt Rishikesh trip, those who know, know) - and everything would fall in the right place, If not, I have got your back now and always. Cheers to the past 4 years and a life-long friendship. THANK YOU!
author: Piyush

text: A simple, sweet and silent girl struggling to cycle..that was my first impression of you during the treasure hunt (if I am not wrong ;) We were the only ones left behind the group. Big bummer that couldn’t stay till the end (my cycle betrayed!). Fast forward to EE380 labs, all was chill except the over smart TA. kuch dushmani thi usko hmlog ke group se xD. Hopefully next time, you would open up a bit more :) till then all the best, take care and keep shining.
author: Piyush

text:
It’s really hard to express your simplicity and sweetness in words - easily one of the nicest person I know o:)Have seen you inside out (You know what I mean :P)..shouldn’t go into details on public records. Some things about you really intrigue me - how can someone play all day long (you should be the poster boy of Glucon-D) and have so much organised hostel room (Dude, really WTF!, they are not supposed to be organised in the first place :-)). 
It was a pleasure being your script-writer from Nishika in fresher to Minki in senior year...chutiya tmhara kata...but dukh hmko bhi hua ;)...I guess they didn’t know you have 6-pack abs, a good job and a kind soul (Khud so jaayenge usko…..)..oh that qualifies you for marriage (already late by Rajasthani standards xD).. can wait to share your rangeen hostel kisse with bhabhi-sa (it’s time to forget Kristen Stewart).
Your room has always been our backchodi adda...your Gurgaon flat will be one too :) You are better than a bank when it comes to safeguarding money but you used to steal my roomie and his shipment..very bad! ;) Just a friendly reminder - I play better badminton and mini-militia than you. Period. Most probably you would agree, if not, I do have ice cream.
I have got your back just like that Antaragni night dare. Have roamed around a lot together, still, a lot left to explore.  It would be near impossible for someone to know you and not like you for the person you are. Thanks for always being there except PHY103 endsem...hahaha!!. Love you, bro! M just a call away! All the best! A very bright future awaits!
P.S - Is sem to firse dassa aarha hoga !?
author: Piyush

author: Piyush

text:
You were a hard nut, thankfully I had Meena to help me crack you up. You are a bit moody and sometimes seriously mess up. Hopefully, you remember a few quarrels we had but it turned out fine in the end. Having DOPA as roommate has its own perk and I must say, you have a very well-curated collection :P got a lot of exposure from you -from CCD’s devils own to good English music, from GOT to the vixen, and many more.

Your attention to minute and keen sense of design is remarkable. Most people here do things that will either fetch good grades or land them a fat job. In that sense, you were very different. Though sometimes overdone, I like your ‘Doing only things I like’ attitude i.e I remember you watching ‘The Office’ instead of studying for Endsem but at the same time putting extra hours to learn Sanskrit and philosophy! 

Do u remember our intense philosophical discussions especially in CCD and those late-night walks afterwards (Wo Jaan Jaan kehke jaan le gye) ?..good old days!  Intelligent to ho hi sir aap bs put your ass to work! All the best! Happy researching! 
B-319 ka tempo high hai!
author: Piyush

text: Bhai tum kite awesome ho :) bole to ekdm jhakkas. Ultra chaapu, xtra humble and good vibes pro max. Football khelne me maza aaya. Google me v chaapte raho aur Pixel wgrh pr off milta ho to batana jarur ;)  Patna aana agli baar to jarur milenge Mukesh ke adde pe :p I hope our paths cross again, and we could vibe more together, till then all the best and take care :)
author: Piyush

text: Rohin Bhai, tum to shakal se hi nek banda lagte ho :) Intern me thodi jaan pehchaan hui apni, baaki office me kr lenge :p Snort ko configure krne me kaafi help kri tumne, aage v krte rehna. Aise chalte raha to agle saal joining hogi apan log ki xD
author: Piyush

text:
Hi Baby, You were the first familiar face I saw at IITK - Day 1 waiting outside hall-2 CC. I didn’t have a clue from Vibrant that you were that chaapu ;) (‘AIR-165 hoon bhai kuch to respect kro’...Ab khush!) 

During SoC, you designed such a beautiful landing page that I had to re-design all of mine…(Just an instance of u being u - ‘chaapu’).  It’s good to have a friend like you when life rushes in...calm and chill...experienced it first hand during internship session when only you, me and Mukesh (from cse/batti/mth) were left to score intern in our wing. The best thing about you is - you are you who are..no filters! Kabhi kabhi random logic de dete ho (ofc different from mine..that’s why random ;))...but banda mast ho! Thanks for making me watch HIMYM! Lucknow se ghumna shuru hua, fir Rishikesh-Mussorie, silsila aage v chalta rahega (plans yaad h na?)...Baaki NeelKanth jaane wale log jo v bole, experiencing zip-lining was a better decision. Period.

Keep embracing the present, enjoying life and not worrying so much about the future as you do! (surely something to be learnt from you) Unique piece ho bhai tum..hmesa yaad rahoge! You have a great future plan (glad that you shared)...all the very best to make it a reality! Looking forward to a fun and memorable stay at Banglaore!
author: Piyush

text:
Nothing’s better than a friend unless it is a teddy like you - give bear hugs, hears your heart out (best listener ever), do great shayaris (Kya likhte ho bhai!..Big Fan...Can't wait for your open mic performance), sing awesome songs, suggest good movies, shares my level of romanticism/realism and tells college gossip, if not enough even feeds you milk...Bhai abhi v time h, sath me factory daal lete (Paisa hi paisa hoga). 

Kabhi Patna me hmse v mil lia kro (bs *akele akele* Mukku se milte ho ;))..would love to explore your favourite stree food joints (Gaya ka tilkut v nahi khilae abhi tak!)...Last 1.5 month would not have been so much fun without you...will always remember the Nainital trip and your pro-tip of doing pushups whenever #*@#..tabhi bahut protein bacha rhe...keep up the progress! Aise hi jahan v jaao ‘Mehfil ki jaan’ bane rehna aur MBA wgrh krke bhul mat jaana...All the best!
author: Piyush

text: Profile pic acchi hai xD. Ab tmhari tareef me kya kahe...om jee sir hi tareef krte krte nahi thakte. ESC101 lab me jaan pehchaan hui thi apani, sab question kr lete the tum...fir thodi hmlog ki v help kr dete the :) Tum jaisa chaapu banda Muzaffarpur se tha, jaan ke badi khushi hui thi . Hall-9 me rehne ke kuch faydo me se tha ki apan dono ki kaafi time baad firse baat hone lagi. Cards khelne me maza aaya. Jahan v raho aise hi fodte raho aur paper publish krte raho. Mauka mila to Bihar me jarur milna till then all the best. Take care and Keep smiling :)
author: Piyush

text:
2 guys having serious discussions for hours about random desh/duniya topics...yeah, thats us!... Hopefully doing our bit for a few of them in future together. I don’t remember how we became such good friends but that’s the point, good things just happen! We have our footprints from Nepal to Rajpath, Naini lake to Lal Tibba, Chandigarh to Triund top and many more. Wishing to scale some more mountains, driving some more miles and doing some more adventure sports together in India and Abroad. 
You are a guy with high ideals and more or less I have seen you stand by them. The whole senator episode was fun...jokingly proposing your candidature in the last hour of nomination in mess...and boom the third-highest votes count! You are generally calm, composed and confident - the gyaani ‘yoda’ of our group.
You constantly cheered me up whether it be jumping off the hills while paragliding, rafting through personal hardships or doing my first 3km run. A huge fan of driving skillschahe bike ho ya car...kya cut maarte ho bhai xD. Had a great stay at IITK.. thanks to amazing friends like you who inspired, comforted and taught a lot at the same time. 

Our friendship has aged like red wine and I know the future holds better.  Just read the autobiography of a yogi, you have been sitting over it for ages. You do good Shayari’s...last day during the storytelling session, I thought she was the...the source of pain in your Shayari’s..but I was wrong..so ultimately *turns out* you have good storytelling skills also. You laugh hard and say ‘fuck’ even harder (Virginity’s hurting, uh?) Happy Exploring...I hope you find something worth settling for. Just a call away!
Aajao... **Awkard hugs**...Chalo Badhia!
PS - Keeping laughing randomly without reasons as you always do!
author: Piyush

text: Convenor saab _/|\_ , sune hai IITK aane ke jagah Patna me tution kr rhe ho :P..rangeen zindagi me aur kita rang  ghologe bhai ;) Ye sab technique hmlog ko v sikhao kabhi. Shayari wgrh krne ke picche ka master plan dheere dheere samajh me aarha. Kudos to your efforts in Galaxy (Hall-2 ka tempo high hai!) Hmesa tmhare wing me hi mera cooler ka pipe kaise milta tha..ye baat aaj tak raaz hi h? Fursat me Patna me milne ki kripa krein xD. Aise hi bindaas raho aur bina dil chota kie prayas jaari rakho..safalta jarur milegi :)
author: Piyush

text:
Yo Scooty partner, remember every time on steep slopes you used to lean onto me so that our front tyre stays on the ground unlike the one time in Mussoorie. (George Everest pr to ye technique v fail ho gyi thi) It was so kind of you to not complain even once :)

I will always remember how readily you agreed to come with me to the TI interview and stayed the whole time with me even when we weren't that close friend back then. It was a great comfort and support having you there. Thank you! Uttrakhand trip was a milestone in our friendship and since then coming to your room, discussing last year papers and revising formulas from your notes diary became a ritual before exams. 

Kaafi chaapu ho bhai tm ever ready with sharp and subtle replies. Lete-lete raat bhar me kuch v kar sakte! (seen you enough times pulling off assignment and exams B) Just figured out that we didn't tease each other much this whole time ;)...next time  gila shikwa poora kr lenge! All the best batti lord and stay in touch!
author: Piyush

text:
The first memory I have of you is from orientation days, you were shooting our Harlem-shake video xD (phone me ho to group me daal dena :D)...us time kise pata tha ki ye banda aage chalke itta fodega!

Really love your clarity, sense of purpose and conscious efforts to balance various aspects of life (efforts to gym jaane ke v lagae :p). Bummer that we became friends a bit late, if only I had known we would have such a good time, really great conversations and learn so much from you...would have joined you eating chicken in canteen much earlier.
 
Thanks a lot for your help and guidance during internship  (‘PPO is a no-brainer’). Occasional phone pe charcha to chalti rahengi! Quantum ML pehli baar tmhi bataye...zyada samajh to nahi aya but sunke accha laga ;p...research wgrh kro mast, ab to backchod offers v aagye (much deserved). Really happy for you. Party pending hai, milo kabhi! Aur iphone wgrh lete aana (yaad h na?)  

Wish you all the success in the world. More power to you to touch ‘10 million lives’ and many more. aur Shaadi me jarur bulana ;) All the best!
author: Piyush

text: Have seen and appreciated your goodness, sadly from a distance...time passes so quickly, never got to know you closely (Hopefully our path would cross sometime!). You seem to be a very good guy. Chaapu ho ye to hm jaante hi the baaki bakait v hazaro baar bataya xD All the best for your prep. Wish you a grand success (Do let me know :P) I hope you get service and cadre of your choice :) Take care!
author: Piyush

text: It was good to have a friendly face at IITK. Together since 2010. Pata chala Musoorie me v join kr lie tum hmko ;) Waise college me to Kam hi darshan die, special request pe CCD aajaya krte the PUBG se time nikal kar :p  but wahan v lewa dete tha! Pubg wapas aarha sune, khush to bahot hoge? Bung-panti v kam kr die ab xD Simple, relaxed aur Chaapu to tum shuru se hi ho...aage v rehna ;) Zomato me khoob khaana aur paisa thoosna :) Stay in touch wgrh to formality hojaaega. Vidyapith wale sabke saath alag hi connection hai...evergreen time-tested friendship :) Take care bro. ..Party pending h :p
author: Piyush

text:
From Shashi’s quiet roommate to a dear friend, Vipin Bhai - nice, soft-spoken, sincere, chauvinistic and a wise counsel, ever ready with witty replies! You have grown a lot - from a vernacular student struggling in 1st year to nailing academics and many more! Can’t imagine passing IME without your help O:). Your hard work has eventually paid off (GATE rank speaks for itself)!

Scooty rides, rafting and zip-lining were crazy! Becoming good friends sooner and visiting few more destinations would have been great (thanks to covid, couldn’t pull off our last college trip) ...hopefully in future! Anyways, got to spend a lot of time with you in the last 1.5 month (enjoyed every bit of it) - playing cards, watching movies, jamming songs and long walks (grabbing roll/shakes along the way), so I guess not getting PG roll has some perks too!   

I admire your simplicity, strive for self-improvement (Writing skills++) and kaatilaana smile! Just believe in yourself and you would do wonders :) Jahan v raho aise hi chaapte rehna aur bhai ko yaad rakhna. All the best!
author: Piyush
